09-12-2024: - Ground Slam now allows you to turn during the descent
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike Damage spirit scaling increased from 0.78 to 0.85
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike Damage Per Meter Spirit scaling increased from 0.045 to 0.05
08-29-2024: - Improved firing arm position to be a little bit more out of the way from the reticle
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Grapple|Size=20}} Grapple no longer gives a stamina charge on use
08-15-2024: - Fixed some cases where Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike would cause your hero to be stuck
- Health per boon increased from 37 to 42
- Base spirit resist increased from 8% to 15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20}} Flog T3 now also reduces Fire Rate by 35%
- Kinetic Carbine no longer affects channels, cast times or things like Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam
08-01-2024: - Fixed Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike sometimes causing the hero to be stuck for the rest of the match
- Added new visual effects for Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike Damage Per Meter reduced from 6.3 to 6.0
07-18-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Grapple|Size=20}} Grapple weapon damage is now added into the T2 instead of in the base
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike radius reduced from 13m to 11m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam grab time reduced from 0.8s to 0.6s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam cast range increased from 14m to 18m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam throw distance reduced from 20m to 12m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam T1 changed from +4m Cast Range to +8m Throw Distance
07-11-2024: - Base bullet damage reduced from 11.5 to 10
- Bullet damage growth increased from 1 to 1.15
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike damage per meter reduced from 6.75 to 6.3
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike damage per meter spirit power scaling increased from 0.04 to 0.05

- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam range is now defined as the horizontal distance to the units rather than the distance from his position in the air (so being high up doesn't work against you)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam range reduced from 19m to 14m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam T1 reduced from +5m to +4m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam cone increased from 60 degrees to 75
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam grab time reduced from 0.9 to 0.8
06-27-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike radius reduced from 14m to 13m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam radius reduced from 20m to 19m
06-20-2024: - Fixed it being possible to lose your full lock on with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam sometimes if you look away
06-13-2024: - Fixed Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike T3 not being accurate in the tooltip
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike base damage reduced from 110 to 90
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike damage per meter increased from 6 to 6.75
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike now reduced scaling after 25m height to 4.5
05-30-2024: - Various fixes to Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike visual effects
05-23-2024: - Added some additional visual tells for the receiving end of Lash’s {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike base Damage Per Meter reduced from 8 to 6
- Fixed some cases with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike not hitting units positioned just below the impact zone
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20}} Flog angle increased from 20 degrees to 30 degrees
05-16-2024: - Updated Lash {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam sound effects
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike Stomp Damage reduced from 125 to 110
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam cooldown increased from 110s to 130s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Grapple|Size=20}} Grapple Bullet Damage bonus increased from +4 to +6
05-10-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike now additionally damages enemies within 2m of Lash on impact
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike radius reduced from 16m to 14m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike's ground preview now lines up under Lash when cast on the ground
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike T3 reduced from +100% to +85%
- Bullet Damage growth increased from 0.76 to 1.0
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam tether visuals now improved to communicate the different phases its in
05-03-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20}} Flog lifesteal from heroes increased from 70% to 80% of damage dealt
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20}} Flog lifesteal from non-heroes reduced from 35% to 30% of damage dealt
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam T1 from +3m to +5m
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam's targeting cone not finding enemies near the edges
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam to only target enemies who stay in the targeting cone
